channel.title: Help please, first time making server
channel.description:
Hello all, so far i have read nearly EVERY post for help that i'd need first off is making me Owner and having crown
i dowloaded the source cheezescape some1 said too me go too characters and look for ur name and change the rights..my answer theres no names in there..there's not even PLACEYOURNAME here thing in the files for admin/co owner. ^ help please.
2. I dont understand this "Port Forward" stuff..help me please.
3. when i made my ip at no-ip i go and type in my ip in mopar and it doesnt work..im stuck on 0.0.0.0 :(
Also how do i make inf hp and stats..i dont understand any of it..
Also how do i spawn npc's?
Think YOU can help ME out? if so, POST away and help a guy out making his first server a successful one :)
Your Regards - Jukesy[br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 01:16:44 AM[/size][hr]WOOT!!! made my self admin!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! but idk if im owner and i cant see crown

item.title: Help please, first time making server
item.dc:creator: @0.o 0.o
item.description:
@0.o wrote:

first off, start ur server and log in with the port it says and ur ip, now log out and ur name will be the name of a .txt file in cahracters, open it find player right = 0, change the 0 to a 3 now spawning npc’s, go to ur autospan.gfc c&p the following

spawn = NPCID	Xcord	Ycord	0	0	0	0	0	1	Name

You would chanfe the last 4 0’s to Xcords and Ycords if u want npc to move, here ill post an example
Moving NPC

spawn = 1615	2666	9824	0	2653	9834	2673	9817	1	Abbyssal Demon

Not moving NPC

spawn = 1834	3170	3176	0	0	0	0	0	1	Lumbridge Swamp Candle Seller

(there are spaces u just cant see the unless u paste it into a .txt file =)

Read full topic
